Removing sessionhosts from an Azure Virtual Desktop hostpool.
The function will search for sessionhosts and will remove them from the Azure Virtual Desktop hostpool.
Enter the AVD Hostpool name
The sessionhosts name prefix (avd-)
The use of a managed disk or not (default: True)
The OS disk type ("Standard_LRS", "Premium_LRS", "StandardSSD_LRS")
This is the part of the VMsize information. (eg. Standard_B2ms)
This is the part of the VMsize information. How many cores.
This is the part of the VMsize information. The RAM size in GB.
Can be used to add extra values into the template. Please provide a PSCustomObject.

Enter the sessionhosts domain
Enter the gallery image offer
Enter the gallery image publisher
Enter the gallery image sku

Enter the name of the Log Analytics SKU

Exports the AVD environment, based on the hostpool name.

Enter the AVD hostpool resource group name.

Enter the AVD hostpool resource group name.

{{ Fill Console Description }}

This is a switch parameter which let you control the output to show only the sessionhosts which are not started from the latest version.

You can put the hostpool object in here.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: Move-AvdSessionHost -FromHostpoolName avd-hostpool -FromResourceGroupName rg-avd-01 -ToHostpoolName avd-hostpool-02 -ToResourceGroupName rg-avd-02 -SessionHostName avd-host-1.avd.domain

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new RBAC role for AVD autoscaling
The function will create a new RBAC role and assign it at subscription or resourcegroup level.
Enter the role name
Enter the role description
If you like to scope at resourcegroup level, provide the resourcegroup name. (Default subscription scope)
If you like to assign directly, use this switch parameter
Enter the role name
Enter the role description
If you like to scope at resourcegroup level, provide the resourcegroup name. (Default subscription scope)
If you like to assign directly, use this switch parameter

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: New-AutoScaleRole RoleName avd-autoscale RoleDescription "Plan for autoscale session hosts"

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: New-AutoScaleRole RoleName avd-autoscale RoleDescription "Plan for autoscale session hosts" -resourcegroup rg-avd-001 -Assign

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: $sessionHosts = Get-AvdSessionhost -HostpoolName avd-hostpool -ResourceGroupName rg-avd-01 $sessionHosts | Update-AvdSessionhost -HostpoolName avd-hostpool -ResourceGroupName rg-avd-01 -AllowNewSession $true
